phrases: If you are not paying attention, be prepared for a poking attack from my fingers
I am little, but I will squish you; you are as tiny as a flea to me
What I want is a plastic heart (plus, plus, but it is a minus)
But that is boring; when I would notice it, I would have won against you
Love is something that is bittersweet
Simple and clear yet complex and strange stuff
I am only worrying about things that do not matter
You are gentle and sincere yet eccentric
I pretend to be strong all over and compete against you
Just by being honest, it is so stimulating and I feel dizzy
I get hurt, I hurt you, in a preparation of pure feelings
In my head, there is always a pre-parade of pure feelings all by myself
Then let us put salt on
Because I want you to know more about me
More than anyone else, I want to bare my self
But I cannot do it, I have got nothing for experience
But a love that is just sweet
Is slightly different from what I am seeking
If I am told it is white
I would say it is black
I say one thing but do another
If I am told, I love you
I would say, I hate you
I am happy, but what am I saying?
You, who are going to the sea
I guess I have no choice.
If you insist, I will marry you.
Taiga-chan gave birth to so many puppies!
Even though it is finally summer break,
I am having these dreams because of the stupid DVDs we rented.
Even for a dream, that is one awful future.
You were a dog, and my husband was the dog.
telling me that if I do not work out a counter-plan,
that is what the future holds.
That is what that dream was.
one side should fully support the other starting with the trip tomorrow.
Listen, be careful when using the stove.
Stir the rice bran once a day.
Make sure to change Inko-chan's water in the morning.
Read the rest in the note I left behind.
Well, I will be going, then.
Did not I tell you already?
Looks like the weather's going to be great!
So I am counting on you for that plan.
Hey, you sure it is okay?
Now hurry up and get this thing off me!
If it were not for that dumb dog getting involved, I would have won!
It was punishment for setting up a match in something you are good at.
Nothing good ever comes out of anything involving dogs.
Still, will it really go smoothly?
When this trip is over, your relationship with Minorin will be -
My, the weather seems to be in our favour!
Come to think of it, Amin's not here yet.
There is still some time left.
You are two minutes late, Ami!
Do not run away, Stupid Chihuahua!
There is a plum in this that makes it super plum!
Just what I would expect from Takasu.
Want to marry into my family?
it seems Aisaka-san did not come.
Takasu-kun, go get in touch with -
What the hell are you doing?!
Oh, the Stupid Chi' is awake?
I thought you were sleeping with your eyes open.
Do not fight when we are on a trip.
That aside, what have you been doing during summer break so far, Kawashima?
I have been working the whole time.
Club activities, work, club activities, work, club activities, club activities, work,
club activities, work, club activities, work, club...
J-Just now, I heard senpai in a strange voice!
Sampled from CD's with more to them than just what they advertised; a collection of spirit voices.
Do you enjoy horror stuff like that, Aisaka?
It is also rather surprising that Kushieda's scared of eerie things.
I am super scared of it, you know!
Rather than super scared, you could say I am incredibly scared -
You see, Minorin is really scared of horror movies, spirits,
That is why we are going to scare Minorin to death.
Then you are going to save her when she is at the peak of her fear,
with a, I will protect Kushieda!
This is called the Scare Minorin, Enter the White Knight plan!
Sheesh, how far do we have to walk?
Let us go around the back.
Keep going that way and I think we will be on the balcony.
We are going to be staying here?!
But we have to clean the place up first.
Nobody's been here since last year.
This looks like it will be one hell of a fight.
We have got this pretty sea right in front of us!
Let us leave cleaning up for last!
Why am I cleaning all by myself?
Wah, it is a floating corpse!
I have been soaked in corpse water!
Looks like they are having fun.
Wah, then it is a seaweed corpse!
I have been soaked in seaweed corpse water!
You really came, did not you, Yuusaku.
Ami said to go out shopping.
Apparently there is a bike in the she would.
If that is the case, take Taiga with you.
You finally had a chance to be alone together.
I had an idea, you see.
we have got to find somewhere suitable to play out that plan.
You are just embarrassed, just admi -
Even if you say somewhere suitable...
You are really bold, are not you?
Coming in while a girl's showering...
I-It is not like I did it on purpose!
We can keep it a secret from everyone else...
Hey, do not you want to do it?
Making it sound like she was taking a shower?
Playing with a man's pure heart?
Did you finish investigating the second floor?
That is why you got tricked by the likes of the Stupid Chi'!
And while I am at it, I am going to tell her off as well!
The Stupid Chi' was actually in the bath.
He is putting the bike away.
You did the shopping, after all.
J-Just now, something... o-on my neck...
Something definitely touched me just now!
I-It really does smell like seaweed!
Like an animal spirit entwined in seaweed!
When it comes to being entwined in seaweed, it has to be the corpse of a sea otter!
A sea otter with its stomach pocket filled with scallops?!
It is the curse of the sea otter and seaweed!
I do not want it spicy!
I cannot eat it if it is not sweet!
I will make sure your portion is sweet.
You are giving special treatment to Aisaka-san again...
That will make girls hate you, you know.
I just have to add the roux.
Come on, you guys have to prepare for dinner -
Even I can help out with setting the table.
So the girls were here too.
while looking like that and pretending to be modest?!
It was probably a seaweed spirit!
There is an evil spirit lurking in this house.
Is there anything I can do?
I made it with what I had available, but...
It is not as spicy as I thought it would be.
You want to try it too, Taiga?
I have received the full impact of this meal!
It does indeed have a strange, addictive quality...
I am starting to feel strange...
I thought I was going to die...
I am going to do the dishes.
I think it is because I ate spicy food, but...
But I did not bring med -
I brought some stomach medicine with me.
Since it is in my room, want to come with me?
Then, I will leave it to you.
It is a chance for you to be alone together.
You were spacing out, you see.
More importantly, if you would like, we could go to the beach toge -
Hey, Takasu-kun, could you get that glass for me?
Seeing Aisaka in pain hurts me too.
If it hurts, would you like to lie down?
You... have amazing cleaning techniques, do not you?
Well, I am doing it all the time at work, after all.
Takasu-kun's curry was prepared with splendour as well.
I will give you something great as thanks for helping out!
Keep it a secret from everyone else.
Takasu-kun, is the green tea flavour good?
Not so much with the azuki one.
It is just the two of us.
Is this what you would call a chance?
Do you think it is still around?
but I have never seen one,
and I do not believe the stories from people who have.
And then, you see, I think of something else the same way.
I believe that one day, I will be in love, get married, and be happy.
But there is nobody who has had it spelt out like that, is there?
I think that the existence of people in the world who are meant to love one another is a bit far-fetched.
I mean, I cannot see them.
Ghosts do not really exist, so I will never see one in my life,
is how I have resigned myself.
And because of that, there is no answer to your question.
Are you someone who can see ghosts?
Because of that, I go to places with spirits and I watch scary DVDs.
I think there are people who have seen them, but then tried to deny their existence,
while on the other hand, there are those who put in an effort to finally be able to see them.
That is why I do not think you have to resign yourself to never seeing one in your life.
I thought it was a UFO.
I think it would be great if you could see a ghost someday, Kushieda.
Because I think that there is a ghost out there that wants you to see it.
So that is why lots of strange things happened today, right?
The seaweed spirit is appealing to me!
What is with that, all of a sudden?
Maybe I will see them one day?
I think my stomach's all better.
I am talking about that plan, obviously.
You are not doing your part properly at all.
I am the support this time around!
I kept thinking about how happy I would be after spending an entire day with Kitamura-kun,
but I was so nervous that I could have died an early death.
Though when I am with you, I am completely fine...
What is that supposed to mean?
This room is so big, yet we are sitting this close to each other...
It is like the habits of being in a small apartment have stuck.
Did I put my bag here?
What do you think this is?
It was in my bag, yet when I touched it earlier, it was still warm.
It is as if someone had just been wearing it...
On my pillow, there was long hair -
It is a continuation of that dream where we are living in a dog house and giving birth to dogs!
Then, if we close our eyes, we will wake up sometime, right?
But the scariest might be UFOs...
